action_points.description: Implement an advanced threat detection system that utilizes machine learning to identify and respond to sophisticated phishing attacks, and provide continuous staff training on these emerging threats.
Establish a dedicated task force to actively monitor and assess the security posture of new technologies before their deployment, ensuring vulnerabilities are addressed promptly.
Develop and enforce sector-specific cybersecurity protocols and resilience strategies for critical infrastructure, with a focus on rapid incident response and recovery plans.
